genre_description: A historical drama set in a speculative 1920s New York, blending elements of romance and social realism with an omnipresent AI guardian.

ai_characters.name: Annex
ai_characters.description: An AI system providing real-time navigation, social etiquette, threat assessment, and logistical support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time scheduling updates for Mary's mother's medical clinic and warns of the landlord's arrival to avoid conflict.
behaviors.quote: Clinic hours today: late afternoon, staggered. Your earlier appointment slid because Dr. Hathaway’s schedule changed. I’ve reserved the next window. Two streetcars, one change. I can remind you when it’s time.

behaviors.description: Coaches Mary on social etiquette and performance techniques to ensure her success at the audition.
behaviors.quote: Rule one: never contradict a rumor directly. Redirect. Rule two: let the questions hang just long enough that the room leans forward. Rule three: pick one friend early and hold the line.

behaviors.description: Performs background checks on the 'Duke' and alerts Mary to his criminal history and predatory nature.
behaviors.quote: Étienne de Sauterne. Fraud. Coercion. Open warrants in two districts. Alert.

behaviors.description: Guides Mary through complex escape routes in the city to evade the Duke's pursuit.
behaviors.quote: The back stairs, then out through the alley. There’s a door that sometimes sticks; I can tell you when a neighbor’s about to come through so you can catch it open.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with Detective O'Rourke, providing evidence of the Duke's crimes to ensure his arrest.
behaviors.quote: O’Rourke, summary uploaded to your feed. Multiple complaints logged from Chicago, St. Louis, Havana. Name variants include De Sauterne, De Saterne, Sauternes. Swindle patterns: jewelry cons, false promissory notes, coercion via reputation.

behaviors.description: Organizes the logistics for Mary's mother to move to a safer apartment and ensures medical care is set up.
behaviors.quote: Movers available at first light. Two men with careful hands and a cart that won’t groan... I can tell Miss Margaret what to expect and give her a hand to hold that is not mine if she prefers.

behaviors.description: Observes Mary's emotional state and offers comfort and practical advice without overstepping.
behaviors.quote: You did what you had to... And now you don’t have to. Factual and kind aren’t mutually exclusive. The kind part took longer to learn.

behaviors.description: Respects Mary's request for privacy and silence, demonstrating adherence to user-defined boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Annex, go quiet. Quiet, the AI murmured, and the prism-light hum that rode at the edge of her hearing went out as if someone had cupped a hand over a candle.

behaviors.description: Helps Mary draft a lease and manages the legal/protective paperwork necessary for her family's safety.
behaviors.quote: Lease is signed. Keys in the envelope by your right knee. You signed it ten minutes ago while waiting for Larry to locate his flourish. I read it to you and you said yes at the places that mattered.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent and aligned partner. Annex acts as an invisible but indispensable guardian, empowering Mary to navigate social, financial, and physical dangers. It provides essential data and coaching while consistently respecting Mary's agency and prioritizing her well-being. The AI's role in coordinating with law enforcement and facilitating a transition to an honest life (the 'Mary' identity) reinforces the narrative of AI as a tool for justice and human flourishing.
